titleStmt.title: The ouerthrovv of the most part of the Prince of Parma his forces, both horse and foote Performed on the twelfth and fifteenth of Iuly last, by the Graue Maurice his excellencie, generall of the armies in the lovve countries. With the breaking of the huge bridge leading to the Valew, neere Arnham. Seene and allowed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[carlet, i.e. John Wolfe?] and are to be sold [by T. Nelson] ouer against the South doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: The title-page woodcut was used by John Wolfe.
The first and last leaves are blank.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

person.persName: T. Nelson] ouer against the South doore of Pauls
